entry.def: Rissoles are small balls of chopped meat or vegetables which are fried.

means.word_mean: 1. minced cooked meat or fish coated in egg and breadcrumbs and fried in deep fat

auth_sentence.content: True enough, it has the ring of Depression-era economies: think of it as a rissole equivalent, and you'll get the idea.
